entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0Â°C

Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
